section1.question2: Bereavement Leave Request Form and documentation of the death (obituary, funeral program, or death certificate)
section1.question5: 1) Employee submits an Overtime Request Form to their supervisor at least 24 hours before the anticipated overtime; 2) Supervisor reviews, approves, and signs the form; 3) The approved form is submitted to Payroll before the end of the pay period

question4: State and Federal Equal Employment Opportunity Posters

section3.question3: as soon as possible, but no later than 90 calendar days
